OOC: He's made of chaochitan energy, right? Tell me what 
characteristics that energy has, please. 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Quickstrk7@a... wrote:
> Outside Maximal City, The mysterious Infecticon being hovers above 
the base, 
> its eyes glowing a dark blue. It then sends a comm to the entire 
Maximal 
> City. The staff in its hand begins to glow a dark red as energy 
begins to 
> pour out from it and seems to spin around and form some kind of 
vortex, bolts 
> of energy striking some of the surrounding ground causing some 
explosions.
> 
> ????: "All Maximals, I am offering you a chance to save yourselves 
from 
> destruction. I challenge your strongest warrior to face me. Should 
they lose 
> you shall all become my minions. THose who will not submit shall be 
> destroyed. If I lose, then I shall leave you all in peace. I shall 
give you 
> approximately twenty cycles to respond."
